participant_2.background:
I once spent a weekend in a cabin in the woods, cooking my own food and reading books by the fire.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
I'll be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
I don't play sports because I'm too busy going to brunch with my family.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going well! I spent the weekend in a cabin in the woods, cooking my own food and reading books by the fire.
That sounds lovely! I wish I had time to do that more often.
It was really nice! I love getting away from the city and spending time in nature.
Me too. I'm not much of a sports person, so I prefer to spend my free time doing more relaxing activities.
I'm not much of a sports person either. I love to do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
That's a great way to relax! I love to cook, so I spend a lot of time in the kitchen.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I don't have as much time for it as I would like.
I know what you mean. It can be hard to find the time to cook when you have a busy schedule.
Yeah, but it's always worth it when you have a delicious meal to enjoy.
Exactly! So, what do you like to cook?
I love to make all sorts of things, but my favorite is probably pasta.
Pasta is delicious! I love making pasta dishes too.
That's great! Maybe we should cook together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to learn some new recipes.
Great! I'll send you my number.
